name: hyperformant
description: AI-powered market intelligence platform with Next.js + PostgreSQL + n8n architecture

scripts.db:reset: cd web && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:generate: cd web && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma generate
scripts.db:migrate: cd web && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd web && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:studio: cd web && dotenv -e .env.local -- npx prisma studio --browser none
scripts.deploy: npm run validate && npm run db:reset && ts-node src/cli.ts import-n8n
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist/ coverage/ web/.next/ web/node_modules web/package-lock.json

author: hyperformant
